note: Origins: Los Angeles | Lit. degrees from UCR and UCSB | Lived/worked 48+ years San Francisco: Formerly, teacher/principal K thru 12, and at AZ State Prison Florence, SF County Jail | Past Executive Director w/ SF Special Olympics, Diabetic Youth Foundation, SF Big Brothers/Big Sisters, Death Penalty Focus (deathpenalty.org) | Past Admin Director w/ CA Appellate Project (capsf.org/public/about.aspx) | Wrote preface to Mike Farrellâ€™s memoir Just Call Me Mike: A Journey to Actor and Activist.

fields.name: MEMENTO
fields.value: "Do not fear death so much but rather the inadequate life."  -Bertolt Brecht
